aka: Club Friday the Series 14: Marriage License

cast.name: 卡曼妮·耶美肯 Khemanit Jamikorn
查克利·彦纳姆 Shahkrit Yamnarm
肯瓦琳·昂多玛可索恩 Kewalin Udomaksorn

this_title: Club Friday the Series Love & Belief :ทะเบียนสมรส
trans_title: Club Friday the Series 14: Marriage License
introduction: These are love stories of two women who hold different opinions on the marriage certificate. One of them legally got married after being happily in love. One day, her happy ever after comes to an end when her husband decides to marry another woman with the support of his family. The other woman is also married, but she has never been introduced to her husband's family. Her husband is hiding the fact that he still lives with his ex-wife and is dating many girls on the side. Their marriage certificates end up chaining their necks. Which path will the two loyal women take?
foreign_title: Club Friday the Series Love & Belief :ทะเบียนสมรส
